import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import CardTable from '../card-table/CardTable' import MainPage from '../main-page/MainPage' class Home extends Component { render() { return (

Cards

Card Game

The Basics : Hand Ranking
1.  All Same : K, K, K     
2.  Straight : 10, 9, 8     
3.  Two of a Kind : 5, J, J    
4.  Highest Card : A, J, 2    
Note : Suits of a card doesn't matter
) } } export default Home
